item.description:
Art Classes 4 Adults & Children
Wednesday, Mar. 7th., 7 pm. to 9
Makeit lab 29 Crown St. Nashua, NH.   http://www.makeitlabs.com/__MEETUP_BR_REPLA...
& 38 Turkey Hill rd. Merrimack NH.
Instructor & Host: Steve Obermiller ( Steve O1b.) 603-491-1962   ob@tds.net
Cost: $100 for 6 two hour classes, plus, materials & supplies.
Day & times of classes:  At this time, we are planing for classes on Mondays & Wednesday Nights for 7 to 9 pm. Also, Saturdays & Sundays 11am. to 1pm. Those times and days will be determined by the class area and students availability. When you RSVP for this event. Please say the what type of class you are interested in, and the day and times that work best for you. We will try to choices our class times from that info.. Wednesday Steve O1b. will be showing people some of what can be done in some of these classes at his home in Merrimack NH..  He will also be taking registration forms from those who wish to join us.          Class Subjects:
Drawing: We will work on using and understanding the tool of drawing, Lines, Contour lines, shapes, perspective and more.
Painting wil work on some of the tool and materials. Color mixing and uses, along with preparing work surface and finish.
Sculture: We will be work with easy materials to start with depending on the skills of the students. Materials range from paper, wood, plastic, clay, stone, metal, and composites materials.
Stained Glass: We will learn some of the history of this material and the tool supplies. Projects will be simple to start. Depending on the skill and desires of the student.
 Metal Smith: We will be learning some of the history, and working with cooper sheets to make sculptures and other object.
 Welding, This is class for the artist. You will be shown how to use the equipment and how to weld a simple project.
Carving. We will be working with some of the tools and Materials used in carving. We will be caring wood, wax, clay, and stone. Depending of the skill and drive of the student.
Location of classes will be determined by the subject and size of the class;

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and he, his, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
